snippet.title: Spinnortality | Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Spinnortality is available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/822990/Spinnortality/
And itch: https://jamespatton.itch.io/spinnortality-beta-builds

The first ten minutes of a game of Spinnortality: https://youtu.be/09TN7NgepEs


------- About Spinnortality -------

Power and wealth are just stepping stones to immortality.

In a future dystopia where corporations are king, forge a company that will dominate the globe. Control the media, manipulate social norms, cause riots, crash stock markets, topple governments.

 •  Achieve immortality with cutting edge tech.
 •  Bribe politicians, spread fake news, rig elections.
 •  Research horrific products. Market them so they’re irresistible.
 •  Crash stock markets, trigger riots or topple governments.
 •  Determine humanity's future.

------- Reception -------

“It’s a delicious premise and executed well [...] It’s weirdly intoxicating [...] It’s a remarkably deep simulation, with more layers of strategy emerging as your company grows.”
 - PC Gamer

“It’s a highly addictive game with stylish visuals, a well designed UI and deep strategic gameplay [...] Highly recommended.”
 - Alpha Beta Gamer

“I had a blast playing this game [...] I think the developer's really onto something [...] I get to be a giant, evil corporation and I get to convince everyone that I'm an awesome guy.”
 - Splattercat Gaming

“It’s a harrowing tale of the reach corporations could (or do) have in reality.”
 - Marcello Perricone, Strategy Gamer

More info: https://spinnortality.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/spinnortality/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/james_d_patton
